text: Diahann Carroll (born Carol Diahann Johnson; July 17, 1935 - October 4, 2019) was an American television and stage actress and singer. She was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actress. Later she played the role of Dominique Deveraux on the popular soap opera, Dynasty. Carroll was born in the Bronx and raised in Harlem. She was briefly engaged to British journalist David Frost. In 1997, she was diagnosed with breast cancer, but was cancer-free after radiation therapy. Carroll died of cancer on October 4, 2019 in Los Angeles at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Actors from the Bronx Category:Actors from Manhattan Category:Singers from New York City Category:Models from New York City Category:African-American actors Category:African-American singers Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:New York University alumni Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Diahann Carroll
